column4: I installed xchat-gnome a while ago, but removed it again as I like the normal xchat better. But in firefox everytime i try to enter a irc:// link it want to open xchat-gnome, how can i change this to the right application?
in the >.> i know this let me think
I found something about configuring the IRC handler in about:config, but it doesn't work :( it still wants to run xchat-gnome
